glsa.title: NX Server Free Edition, NX Node: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: An unspecified vulnerability in NX Server Free Edition and NX Node could allow local attackers to gain root privileges.

background.p: NX Server Free Edition is a remote display technology by No Machine. NX Node provides the shared components for NX Server.

description.p: NX Server Free Edition and NX Node use nxconfigure.sh, a setuid script containing an unspecified vulnerability.

impact.p: A local attacker could gain escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All NX Server Free Edition users should upgrade to the latest version:
All NX Node users should upgrade to the latest version:
NOTE: This is a legacy GLSA. Updates for all affected architectures are available since August 23, 2011. It is likely that your system is already no longer affected by this issue.
